text: Ceroplesis hauseri is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Hintz in 1910. It is known from Tanzania, Malawi, and Uganda.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis hauseri. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It contains the varietas Ceroplesis hauseri var. conjuncta. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1910
title: Ceroplesis hauseri
